wms_article.title: Handsome Q2 operating profit down 82% amid weak fashion demand

wms_article_body.body: South Korean fashion company Handsome reported an operating profit of 700 million won ($511,000) on a consolidated basis for the second quarter of 2025, down 82 percent from the same period in the year before, according to a regulatory filing on Monday. Revenue for the quarter came in at 338.1 billion won, marking a 1.1 percent decline year over year. A company official attributed the earnings drop to prolonged sluggishness in fashion consumption due to the domestic economic downturn and abnormal weather conditions. However, the official said that online sales saw a slight increase from a year earlier, supported by an influx of new online customers and a rise in average transaction value.
